person.persName: Milton Evans (Lewis Co, KY, farmer and captain, 10th KY Cav Reg USA)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Ohio native.Married to Louisa Ann Maple Evans in Lewis County on March 7, 1837. Married to Naomi Maple Evans in Mason County in October 1840. Father of David Evans, Dan Evans, Mary Evans, Julia Evans, America Evans, Vashti Evans, Richard Wm. Evans, and Henry Evans. Farmer in Lewis County in 1860. Served in the 10th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as captain from September 9, 1862 to September 17, 1863.
